articles.description: MasterChef winner Julie Goodwin shocks with X-rated Twitter joke
articles.content:
Julie Goodwin, we did not see this coming.Australia’s very first MasterChef winner just stunned her fans with an absolutely filthy – and very funny – response to a viral Twitter question.

articles.author: Edd Kimber
articles.title: Three sweet and simple treats to bake in a brownie tin - Good Food
articles.description: Is there a brownie tin lurking in your pantry? You can cook pretty much anything in Edd Kimber's new cookbook.
articles.content: Don't own every baking vessel known to man? That's OK. If you have a brownie tin and a few basic ingredients, you'll be able to make pretty much anything in British baker and food writer Edd Kimber's… [+9689 chars]
